desc: The easy way to save money on beautiful vinyl, hardwood, and laminate floors. We offer wholesale pricing for all major brands including Mannington Adura, Adura MAX, Mannington Hardwood, Mannington Laminate, Anderson Hardwood, IVC, Kahrs, Metroflor, Konecto, Mohawk, Paramount, Quick Step, Shaw, Somerset, and more.
